channel.title: RedNotDead on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in RedNotDead on ZooBerry

item.title: Animal Space Hack
item.description: Reduces animals’ space requirements to 1 square.

item.title: Completed Scenarios/Challenges Unlock
item.description: Unlocks all scenarios and challenges without playing through them.

item.title: ES Theme Objects Unlock
item.description: Unlocks Endangered Species theme objects with a saved game file.

item.title: Hacked ATM Money Cheat for MM2
item.description: Gain $640,000 whenever you delete an ATM in MM2.

item.title: Sell Your Animals
item.description: Allows adoption of animals for cash.

item.title: AA Options XML File
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in African Adventures.

item.title: ES Stuff Unlock
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in Endangered Species.

item.title: Everything Unlocked Hack
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in ES, AA, and MM.

item.title: Free Staff
item.description: Makes all staff free to hire and maintain.

item.title: Long Lasting Koi Hack For MM2
item.description: Extends the lifespan of koi in Marine Mania.

item.title: Moveable Animal Babies Statue
item.description: This hack makes the animal babies statue moveable.

item.title: Sell Your Animals/Space Hack
item.description: Allows selling animals for profit and reduces space requirements.

item.title: ZT2 Completed Scenarios/Challenges Unlock
item.description: Unlocks campaigns and challenges in Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: ZT2 With AA Only Options XML
item.description: Unlocks the campaigns and challenges in African Adventures.

item.title: Crazy Fence Pack
item.description: A pack of crazy-themed fences to match the Crazy Paths pack.

item.title: RedNotDead Crazy Path Pack
item.description: A pack of 10 colorful and crazy paths.

item.title: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack
item.description: Snow Tigers Special Theme Pack with paths, fences, and more.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon Fansites Blimps
item.description: A pack of 12 blimps based on Zoo Tycoon fansite designs.

item.title: Invisible Fence
item.description: An invisible fence for exhibits.

item.title: Endangered Species Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Endangered Theme from Endangered Species.
